original_text: You, the king, are like that tree. You have become great and strong. Your power reaches up to the sky. Your authority reaches to the ends of the world.
korean_text: 왕이여 이 나무는 곧 왕이시라 이는 왕이 자라서 견고하여지고 창대하사 하늘에 닿으시며 권세는 땅 끝까지 미치심이니이다

sentences.original_text: You, the king, are like that tree.
You have become great and strong.
Your power reaches up to the sky.
Your authority reaches to the ends of the world.
